title: About the Deputy-Secretary-General | Secretary-General | United Nations

quotes: She took office in February 2017 and is the fifth occupant of the post.
Ms. Mohammed first joined the United Nations in 2012 as Special Adviser to former Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon with the responsibility for post-2015 development planning.

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: The current Deputy Secretary-General is Ms. Amina J. Mohammed, of Nigeria. She took office in February 2017 and is the fifth occupant of the post.
Ms. Mohammed first joined the United Nations in 2012 as Special Adviser to former Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon with the responsibility for post-2015 development planning.

organizations.name: United Nations Sustainable Development Group
quotes: Ms. Mohammed is also Chair of the United Nations Sustainable Development Group.

organizations.name: Federal Republic of Nigeria
quotes: Prior to her appointment to the post of Deputy Secretary-General, Ms. Mohammed served as Minister of Environment of the Federal Republic of Nigeria where she steered the country’s efforts on climate action and efforts to protect the natural environment.
